attributes.action: create a flyover over Sheriffhall roundabout & join the Edinburgh city bypass together
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is all about common sense. Do the road planners who designed this road have any? This road is one of the
busiests roads in Scotland. I think spending £40 million pounds on a Dalkeith Bypass will not solve this problem.
